Targets.description: List of targets that can be pushed to. The array keys are the target names, and the values are the target urls (path to api.php without the '/api.php' part). Example: $egPushTargets['English Wikipedia'] = 'http://en.wikipedia.org/w';

ShowTab.description: Show the push action as a tab (if not, it's displayed in the actions dropdown). This only works for skins with an actions dropdown. For others push will always appear as a tab.

IncTemplates.description: You can choose to include templates when pushing a page.

IncSubpages.description: You can choose to include subpages when pushing a page.

IncFiles.description: You can choose to push files used in a page.

AllowLogin.description: Indicate if login options should be added to the push interface or not.

LoginUser.description: Default login data. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

LoginPass.description: Default login data. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

LoginDomain.description: Default login data. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

LoginUsers.description: Default login data per target. Overrides $egPushLoginUser and $egPushLoginPass when specified. Array keys should be the urls assigned in the $egPushTargets array. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

LoginPasswords.description: Default login data per target. Overrides $egPushLoginUser and $egPushLoginPass when specified. Array keys should be the urls assigned in the $egPushTargets array. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

LoginDomains.description: Default login data per target. Overrides $egPushLoginUser and $egPushLoginPass when specified. Array keys should be the urls assigned in the $egPushTargets array. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

BulkWorkers.description: The amount of push 'workers' (simultanious push requests) on Special:Push.

BatchSize.description: The maximum amount of targets to push a page to in one go.

DirectFileUploads.description: This is needed when pushing to a wiki that cannot access the source file (for example from a private wiki to a wiki on the internet).

TargetsNamespace.description: Other namespaces to push with the same title page.
